data:item.name: SLCD and FXLS8974 Accelerometer Demo on MCXC444
data:item.display_title: SLCD and FXLS8974 Accelerometer Demo on MCXC444
data:item.overview: This demo uses the on board FXL8974 3-axis Low G accelerometer to obtain real time acceleration data, the on board RGB LED to indicate the orientation, and the SLCD interface to print out the y acceleration data.
